name: Binary Studio
tagline: We engineer world-class software for SMBs
description:
Binary Studio is a seasoned software development firm with over 13 years of experience in building world-class software for small and medium-sized businesses.
 
Our greatest advantage among competitors is an incredibly thorough and competitive selection and training processes, which help us assemble effective teams from the top-level talent across Ukraine.
 
As one of the premier development firms in Lviv, we attract and train highly proficient engineers who are reliable, dependable, and invested in their work. We strive to be true partners to our clients and always seek to be a valued part of their team.
